name: NFUT Cards
storyline:
NFUT Cards is a PVP football game with blockchain technology and NFTs collections as game assets where player can play and earn tokens through gameplay and contribute in NFUT ecosystem through the token $NFUT.
All game assets will be stored on Binance Smart Chain, it will be BEP-20, BEP-721.

The project and game will be run entirely by the community through governance explained later in this document. This project is made by and for the people, we will guide the NFUT universe always keeping in mind our motto: You choose, we create.

Our goal is to fight against the injustice of this world creating a long-term project with a revolutionary video game, where anyone around the globe can, firstly, have fun and, secondly, earn money, something unthinkable a few years ago.

By playing NFUT you are not just playing a video game, you are fighting for freedom, independence and decentralised power, where we are all one.

In contrast to other projects in this game the importance of player skill will be key, the amount of money you generate will be directly proportional to your ability.

NFUT wants to make a difference from others creating a community that is led by the players themselves, who will ultimately own the NFUT ecosystem by having governance and decision-making power in a fully democratised environment.

As if it were a social network, we will offer different tools to shape the growth of the platform, such as user chats, searches, live broadcasts and online tournaments.

NFUT game can be played on any device, it will be build entirely with HTML 5, Javascript and other technology and could be accessible on any web browser. It will be necessary to have an internet connection to play.
summary: A play to earn football manager video game where the main assets are football collectibles in the form of NFT's, developed in the Binance Smart Chain.
